text: Ezɨ Devit Filistiaba ko ghua, Atrivim Sol ko mɨsoghasa zuima, Manasen anabamɨn marazi Sol ategha Devit bagha ghue. Ezɨ Devit Filistiabar akurazir puvatɨ. Bizir kam kamakɨn, Filistiabar atriviba faragha Devit ko an adarazi batoke. Me kamaghɨn fo, Devit fomɨra Solɨn akura. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me atiatia ghaze, Devit ua mɨdorozimɨn dughiamɨn, Solɨn adarazir akuragh Filistiabav soghtɨ, me arɨghiregham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, atriviba kamaghɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨam gamigha Devit amadazɨ, a zui.
